quotes.quote: People that trust wholly to others’ charity, and without industry of their own, will always be poor.

If you haven’t any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
All we need is to build human relations with our deeds. That‘s only thing that lasts forever.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
Charity sees the need, not the cause.

When you have more than you need, build a longer table not a higher fence.
Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
To give up yourself without regret is the greatest charity.
The small charity that comes from the heart is better than the great charity that comes from the head.
He who wished to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.
In necessary things, unity; in doubtful things, liberty; in all things, charity.

When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
